subject: Olympic Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant, Jason Kidd and Chauncey Billups are expected to be linchpins of USA Basketball’s next team, which begins Olympic qualifying in Las Vegas on Aug. 22.
snippet: Kobe Bryant, Jason Kidd and Chauncey Billups are expected to be linchpins of USA Basketball’s next team, which begins Olympic qualifying in Las Vegas on Aug. 22.
